name: Saint Peter's Basilica
uniques: May buy [{Military} {Land}] units with [Faith] for [2] times their normal Production cost <before the [Industrial era]>
May buy [{Military} {Land}] units with [Faith] for [3] times their normal Production cost <starting from the [Industrial era]>
Cost increases by [45] per owned city
Enables conversion of city production to [Faith]
Only available <if [Temple] is constructed in all [non-[Puppeted]] cities>

name: Encomienda
uniques: Removes extra unhappiness from annexed cities

name: Riad
uniques: [+1 Food] from [{Desert} {Fresh water}] tiles [in this city]

name: Roman Aqueduct
uniques: [40]% Food is carried over after population increases [in this city]

name: Ulugh Beg's Observatory
uniques: [+2 Culture, +2 Science, +2 Happiness] [in capital] <for every [Skull Pyramids]>
Comment [[Skull Pyramids] are gained by conquering cities]
[+50]% Production when constructing [{Monument} {Amphitheater} {Opera House} {Museum} {Library} {University} {Observatory}] buildings [in your cities] <for [10] turns> <upon conquering a city>
[+33]% Production when constructing [{Monument} {Amphitheater} {Opera House} {Museum} {Library} {University} {Observatory}] buildings [in your cities] <during a Golden Age>

name: Zen Rock Garden
uniques: New [Military] units start with [15] XP [in this city]

name: Althing
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Production] from [Tundra] tiles [in this city]

name: Basílica de la Sagrada Família
uniques: [+4 Culture, +2 Happiness] [in this city] <starting from the [Atomic era]>
[+6 Culture, +4 Happiness] [in this city] <starting from the [Information era]>
quote: 'What must always be conserved is the spirit of the work, but its life has to depend on the generations it is handed down to and with whom it lives and is incarnated' - Antoni Gaudí

name: Big Ben
uniques: [Gold] cost of purchasing items in cities [-15]%
quote: 'To achieve great things, two things are needed: a plan, and not quite enough time.' - Leonard Bernstein

name: CN Tower
uniques: Gain a free [Broadcast Tower] [in all cities]
quote: 'Nothing travels faster than light with the possible exception of bad news, which obeys its own special rules.' - Douglas Adams

name: Dome Of The Rock
uniques: Must have an owned [Desert] within [2] tiles
[+1 Faith, +1 Culture] from [Desert] tiles [in this city]

name: Forbidden Palace
uniques: [+50]% Happiness from luxury resources gifted by City-States
quote: 'Most of us can, as we choose, make of this world either a palace or a prison' - John Lubbock

name: Great Mosque of Djenne
uniques: All newly-trained [Missionary] units [in this city] receive the [Devout] promotion
All newly-trained [Great Prophet] units [in this city] receive the [Devout] promotion
quote: 'With the magnificence of eternity before us, let time, with all its fluctuations, dwindle into its own littleness.' - Thomas Chalmers

name: Hanging Gardens
quote: 'I think that if ever a mortal heard the word of God it would be in a garden at the cool of the day.' - F. Frankfort Moore

name: Himeji Castle
uniques: May buy [Military] units with [Faith] [in this city]
quote: 'Bushido is realized in the presence of death. This means choosing death whenever there is a choice between life and death. There is no other reasoning.' - Yamamoto Tsunetomo

name: Huey Teocalli
uniques: [+2 Culture, +2 Food] from [Lakes] tiles [in all cities]

name: Mausoleum of Halicarnassus
quote: 'The whole earth is the tomb of heroic men and their story is not given only on stone over their clay but abides everywhere without visible symbol woven into the stuff of other men's lives.' - Pericles

name: Panama Canal
uniques: [+2 Production, +4 Gold] from [Canal] tiles [in this city]

name: Pentagon
uniques: Gain [1500] [Gold] <upon expending a [Great Person] unit> <(modified by game speed)>
quote: 'In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable.' - Dwight D. Eisenhower

name: Petra
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Production] from [Desert] tiles without [Flood plains] [in this city]
quote: '...who drinks the water I shall give him, says the Lord, will have a spring inside him welling up for eternal life. Let them bring me to your holy mountain in the place where you dwell. Across the desert and through the mountain to the Canyon of the Crescent Moon...' - Indiana Jones

name: Porcelain Tower
uniques: [+1 Science, +1 Gold] from [Luxury resource] tiles [in this city]
quote: 'Things always seem fairer when we look back at them, and it is out of that inaccessible tower' - James Russell Lowell

name: Statue of Zeus
quote: 'He spoke, the son of Kronos, and nodded his head with the dark brows, and the immortally anointed hair of the great god swept from his divine head, and all Olympos was shaken' - The Iliad

name: The Pyramids
uniques: Can build [all] improvements at a [+25]% rate
quote: 'O, let not the pains of death which come upon thee enter into my body. I am the god Tem, and I am the foremost part of the sky, and the power which protecteth me is that which is with all the gods forever.' - The Book of the Dead, translated by Sir Ernest Alfred Wallis Budge

name: Terracotta Army
quote: 'Regard your soldiers as your children, and they will follow you into the deepest valleys; look on them as your own beloved sons, and they will stand by you even unto death.' - Sun Tzu

name: Grand Temple
uniques: Only available <if [Temple] is constructed in all [non-[Puppeted]] cities>
Cost increases by [30] per owned city

name: Grand Temple of Vilnius
uniques: Only available <if [Temple] is constructed in all [non-[Puppeted]] cities> <when religion is enabled>
Cost increases by [30] per owned city

name: Outremer Stronghold
uniques: Free [Crusader Castle Builder] appears <before the [Industrial era]>
New [{Military}, {Land}] units start with [15] XP [in this city]
Destroyed when the city is captured
